entry.title: $2200 // Carroll Gardens 1 Bedroom + Office with Tin Ceiling and Pet Friendly!
entry.content:
(Listing ID: cl-130853.1) (718) 930-7999


To view our walk through video, please visit our website at: http://destinationrealestate.com/listing?listing=9139-cl

This is a 1 Bedroom + Office in the Carroll Gardens area of Brooklyn. The Apartment Features Tin Ceilings, Celing Fans, Hardwood Floors, Plently of Closet Space, Tile Backsplash in the Kitchen, and Original Details (Including a Fireplace Mantle with Exposed Brick!). Includes Heat, and Hot Water. Dogs and Cats Accepted on Approval.

  • Bedroom 17x11
  • Office Space 12.5 x 6
  • Living Room 16.5x11.5
  • Kitchen Area 16.5x11

This apartment gives you great access to the downtown Brooklyn Nightlife scene as well as quick access into Red Hook, Gowanus, and Cobble Hill. 

Enjoy local Parks and Greeneries, such as Red Hook Park and Recreation Center, Carroll Park and the Smith Street Stage, Cough Triangle, and St. Marie's Playground. Local attractions and stores include: The Gowanus Ballroom and the Gowanus Loft, Rooftop Films, Shipwrecked Miniature Golf, and Oculus 20/20.

Local restaurants and bars include: Other Half Brewing Company, Take A Break & I'll Bake Cafe & Creperie, Frankies 457 Spuntino, and Travel Bar. Local emergency stations include: FDNY Engine 279/Ladder 131 located on Lorraine Street and Smith Street. 

Carroll Gardens also includes dozens of bike paths for easy travel.Subway access to the F and G trains at the Carroll Street Station. Roughly 30 minute commute into Midtown Manhattan.

 

Walk Time to Nearest Train Stations

Carroll St (5 mins):     F, G

Where is this apartment in relation to other neighborhoods?South of Cobble Hill, Boerum Hill, Brooklyn Heights, Downtown Brooklyn, and Fort Greene
East of Red Hook and Columbia Waterfront District
West of Gowanus, Park Slope, and Prospect Heights
